name: Flightless (itch) (ZahranW)
description:
Climb the mountain and gain the power of flight 

 

The game comes with a built in timer. The current world record is

3 minutes 52 seconds - 2 deaths

Control

XJump/GlideCInteractCursor Keys/WASDMoveEnterPause1/2/3/4/5Resize Window0Toggle Audio

Hold C on the title screen to reset save data



Zahran - Program/Audio/Graphics/Design
KingW - Level Design
